# PHAuthorizationStatus.notDetermined

**Case**

The user hasn’t set the app’s authorization status.

## Declaration

```swift
case notDetermined
```

## Discussion

The framework automatically prompts for user authorization when you attempt to fetch assets, asset collections, or collection lists. Alternatively, you may call the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHPhotoLibrary/requestAuthorization(for:handler:)] method to prompt the user for authorization at a time of your choosing.

## Status Types

- **PHAuthorizationStatus.restricted**: The app isn’t authorized to access the photo library, and the user can’t grant such permission.
- **PHAuthorizationStatus.denied**: The user explicitly denied this app access to the photo library.
- **PHAuthorizationStatus.authorized**: The user explicitly granted this app access to the photo library.
- **PHAuthorizationStatus.limited**: The user authorized this app for limited photo library access.
